channel.title: Sweden buys 15 UH-60 Black Hawk Helicopters

Discuss how retarded our right-wing nutty government is.

item.title: Sweden buys 15 UH-60 Black Hawk Helicopters
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:4, topic:390145”][quote author=Frell link=topic=486057.msg3561960#msg3561960 date=1302352015]
why arm up when we could all love and help each other duuddee
[/quote]It is completely pointless because Sweden is a Neutral country. We have NO enemies whatsoever, and even int the unlikely event that it happened, the EU and NATO would interfere, which is more than enough.[/quote]inb4swedenhousesterrorists

Read full topic
item.source: Sweden buys 15 UH-60 Black Hawk Helicopters

item.title: Sweden buys 15 UH-60 Black Hawk Helicopters
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Yeah but it’ll never play out like WWI or WWII again. Those were the last wars for world conquest IMO, unless you see the UN collapsing anytime soon. The only countries with leaders with thoughts like that now are going through revolutions or get prematurely declared war on by USA

In order for another large scale war to happen, there needs to be a huge misunderstanding or a terrorist attack (which literally levels a city and citizens demand retaliation, something large scale). The most likely is that as more countries develop nuclear technology we’ll see them being stolen from the countries that can’t afford/too ignorant to secure them properly. Then we’ve got a problem. If someone ever users a nuclear bomb again, terrorist or military the rest of the world have to decide not to retaliate likewise, otherwise something could escalate enormously.

Read full topic

item.title: Sweden buys 15 UH-60 Black Hawk Helicopters
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:7, topic:390145”]But that was just Germany both times, and people were less liberal back then[/quote]And? The countries involved is pretty irrelevant thanks to our status as a Neutral country in conflicts. Granted, thanks to our douchebag government this is slowly changing (see: sending airplanes to Libya for no reason whatsoever)

Read full topic

item.title: Sweden buys 15 UH-60 Black Hawk Helicopters
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:5, topic:390145”]Aren’t blackhawks used for more than military action? Coast guard or anything?

Or your country just has a minimum requirement of a military, no military at all because you have no enemies at the time is a death threat when another world war breaks out.[/quote]It wasn’t an issue during the last two World Wars, why it would be a problem for the next one? In fact, we did incredibly well during WWII (financially)
